messages.title: Social Care Plan Chaos
messages.content: Pensioners to pay for May's social care U-turn. Dementia tax backlash.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save our NHS and care services. The NHS and Social Care Services are in a state of crisis.
The Liberal Democrat manifesto promises that all cuts to our schools and college budgets will be reversed.
Protect Britain's Place in Europe. Britain is heading into a massive period of uncertainty on Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Protect Britain's Place in Europe. Britain is heading into a massive period of uncertainty on Brexit.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrat manifesto promises that all cuts to our schools and college budgets will be reversed. Funding for 16-18ens. Scrapping Free School Meals.
issues.health: Save our NHS and care services. The NHS and Social Care Services are in a state of crisis.
issues.socialWelfare: The Lib Dems will put a penny on the basic and income Tax rate to save and protect the NHS and Social Care Services. Protect Britain's Place in Europe.

community.content: Local council election pledges, village library, protecting childcare facilities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helping to keep in touch, holding the Conservatives to account.

contactInformation.address: Southwell Lib Dems, 15 Birch Drive, Southwell, NG25 0SG

endorsements.endorsement: David Watts, Liberal Democrat candidate for Parliament, states, 'It is clear that education is a passion for many Southwell parents and our children deserve nothing but the best.'

quotes.text: 'The Tories have executed their second mid-election U-turn in two weeks. Just four days after ruling it out, they are now pledging a cap on individual social care costs.'

examples: The NHS and Social Care Services are in a state of crisis.
Britain is heading into a massive period of uncertainty on Brexit.
Save our NHS and care services
The NHS and Social Care Services are in a state of crisis

personalStories.story: Educational improvements with the Liberal Democrats manifesting in material ways.
